Welcome to Soluna, a platform dedicated to empowering individuals, supporting gender equality, and promoting women’s health. We’ve created a space where everyone is encouraged to learn, share, and grow while maintaining a safe and respectful environment. These Community Guidelines will help us protect the values that make Soluna unique. By using Soluna, you agree to adhere to these guidelines and our Terms of Use. We ask you to actively help maintain our supportive, inclusive, and respectful community.

Our community thrives on diversity, and we are committed to fostering an environment where everyone feels safe, respected, and empowered. Soluna is built to support discussions, education, and advocacy around gender equality, women\'s health, and female empowerment. We do not tolerate any form of discrimination or harassment based on gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, religion, nationality, or any other identity characteristic.

Soluna is a space to share personal experiences, educational resources, and support. We encourage you to share content related to gender equality, female health, and important issues affecting women and marginalized genders. However, all content must align with these guidelines:

We want Soluna to be a place for positive, meaningful conversations that help raise awareness, educate, and support one another. Please follow these guidelines to help us maintain a healthy community:

You retain ownership of your content on Soluna, but you must respect the intellectual property of others. Share only content you have the right to post. Do not post copyrighted materials (e.g., images, videos, and text) without permission.
Soluna is a place for fostering knowledge and sharing information. We do not tolerate illegal or harmful activities.
We are committed to creating a supportive environment. We do not tolerate hate speech, violence, or threats of harm based on gender, race, sexuality, or any personal characteristic.
We understand that important events and news related to gender equality and women’s health are shared on Soluna. While we encourage education and awareness, please be mindful of the following:

We are all part of the Soluna community. If you see content that may violate these guidelines, please report it using the app’s reporting feature. Our team will review the report and take action as necessary to maintain a safe and respectful environment.

We want Soluna to be a safe and empowering platform for everyone. These guidelines are here to help us protect and nurture our community. Together, we can foster an environment where everyone can engage, learn, and grow in the pursuit of gender equality and better health for all. Thank you for being part of the Soluna community.

By adhering to these guidelines, you are contributing to a supportive space where gender equality, women’s health, and safety are prioritized. We are grateful for your participation in creating a positive and empowering environment for all.

How do I create an account on Soluna?

To create an account, download the Soluna app. Click on “Sign Up” and follow the prompts to enter your email and set a password. If you encounter any issues, ensure your email address is valid or contact support at support@soluna.com.
What should I do if I forget my password?
Use the “Forgot Password” option on the login page. Enter your registered email address, and you are able to reset your password now.
Can I access my Soluna account from multiple devices?
Yes, you can access your Soluna account from multiple devices, including smartphones, tablets, and computers. Simply log in using the same credentials on any device.
How do I update my profile information?
To update your profile, open the Soluna app, go to your profile section, and click on the “Edit Profile” button. From there, you can change your name, profile picture, and other personal details.
What type of content am I allowed to post?

You can post educational, supportive, and authentic content related to gender equality, women’s health, and empowerment. Avoid posting anything that violates intellectual property rights or contains hate speech.
Are there any restrictions on posting links?

You can post links to relevant educational or supportive content. However, links that lead to malicious sites, spam, or unrelated advertisements are not allowed and may result in your post being removed.
What is the Soluna Community Guidelines?

The Soluna Community Guidelines outline the behaviors and content that are not allowed on the platform. This includes hate speech, discrimination, explicit content, and harmful behavior. You can view the full guidelines in the app.
Can I share my account with others?

Each Soluna account is meant to be used by an individual only. Sharing your account is against our terms of service and may lead to suspension or termination of your account. Please keep your account details secure.
How do I ensure my privacy while using Soluna?
Avoid sharing sensitive personal information such as your address or phone number publicly. Review our Privacy Policy for tips on managing your privacy settings.
How can I contact support?
You can contact Soluna support by emailing us at support@soluna.com. Be sure to provide as much detail as possible about your issue to help us assist you quickly.
